restaurants.name: Sunrise Bakery
restaurants.description: A cozy bakery offering freshly baked breads, pastries, and a variety of coffee.

restaurants.name: Cafe Mocha
restaurants.description: A popular cafe known for its rich mocha and a wide selection of sandwiches and desserts.

restaurants.description: A quaint cafe serving organic and locally sourced dishes with a focus on vegetarian options.

restaurants.description: A vibrant Chinese restaurant known for its spicy Szechuan dishes and flavorful Peking duck.

restaurants.name: Morning Brew
restaurants.description: A modern cafe with a relaxed atmosphere, offering specialty coffees and a variety of breakfast options.

restaurants.name: Sweet Treats Bakery
restaurants.description: A delightful bakery specializing in cakes, cookies, and other sweet treats, perfect for any occasion.
